price: 41.Waxay ku leeyihiin Jahannama gogollo dab ah, korkoodana waxaa ah daboollo dab ah. Sidaasaanna u abaal marinnaa daalimiinta (gar diidka).
arabic: لَهُم مِّن جَهَنَّمَ مِهَادٞ وَمِن فَوۡقِهِمۡ غَوَاشٖۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lahum min jahannama mihādun wamin fawqihim ghawāshin wakadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
